testsuite.name: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: Given I am logged in as the default administrator
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: And I am on "Class Homepage" page of "Demonstration Class" class
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: And "Student Readiness Test" assignment in "Student Readiness" unit is opened
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: And the content of "Question 1" with title "Assignment Navigation" is displayed
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: When I give the right responses to questions 6-8
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: Then the right responses are saved
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: When I modify the given responses to be wrong
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: Then the wrong responses are saved
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: Then I save and quit assignment to clear assignment state
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: And I am on the Class Homepage
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testcase.name: classMethod
testcase.classname: Scenario: State of the questions is saved when the user is switching between them

testsuite.system-out:
